awards.title: Bravo - Cheers - Demand Excellence
awards.description:
Hi Abe, Thank you so much for everything you have done this past year. You were always there to help and I could always count on you to fix things!! Good luck upcoming year! Many thanks, Marina

From Marina Kerbel

awards.title: Bravo -Cheers - Demand Excellence
awards.description:
Thank you for your amazing graphic design work! - Demand Excellence


Thank you for being a fantastic Culture Champion and a key player behind the scenes as part of the Dublin InDay team in 2015. Your efforts were really appreciated across the team and the office. Your exceptional design and creative skills brought images and events to life throughout the year. Thanks to you for each InDay and milestone event we had amazing posters and slides for our screens. You were always so accommodating with last minute changes and updates and stayed late if needed to get images finished. I had lots of extra request for BIYP signage etc and you helped created a number of welcoming signs for our parents. We look forward to having you continue with your passion and enthusiasm for 2016!!

From: Aoife Conroy

awards.title: Bravo -Thanks - Demand Excellence
awards.description:
M6 Wiki Build - Demand Excellence


Hey guys, the work you have done to build the M6 wiki is phenomenal - it looks fantastic and I couldn't be more impressed by your dedication, commitment and truly demanding excellence of yourselves throughout this work. Thank you so much!!

From: Rebecca Craig

awards.title: Bravo - Applause -Demand Excellence
awards.description:
Results Award RM/CSR - Q2 - Demand Excellence

Abe & Marina – With a rocking 81% of baseline retention 100%> Attainment in Q2 almost 10 points ahead the OKR Based target established for the team, strong Q1 and Q2 that can only lead to a record baseline retention and growth at the end of the year!

awards.title: Bravo - Thanks - Act Like an Owner
awards.description:
The Abe-Factor! - Act Like an Owner

Abe, you are a fantastic example of all our values, and especially act like an owner. From the first day I joined LinkedIn you have lived by this value. You demand excellence from yourself and others around you. Each task you take on you commit to fully and always complete to an excellent level of detail and consideration. You work incredibly hard, always seeking to improve and succeed beyond exoectations. I see this in the creation of InDay posters, in the way you interact with clients (no question is too big to ask you), and in the way you support your colleagues inside and outside your organisation. Working on the Boolean project with you was hugely impactful for LinkedIn clients and colleagues in GSO - another tool they can leverage. It is great to work alongside a person with so much passion for innovation and excellence!

From: 
Martien Hogerzeil

awards.title: BRAVO -Thanks - Relationships Matter
awards.description:
Phrase Express Champion award for Relationships Matter 


"Thank you very much Abe for your outstanding support, knowledge sharing and patience in helping the entire GCO EMEA team learn about and make the most of Phrase Express. Big Kudos for all your help and effort."

From: Orm Steen


I've been using Phrase Express for 1 week now, and haven't opened my Word documents once. Amazing initiative, so happy with it! Thanks Abe!

From: Iris Van Duren


Thank you for making GCO even more successful Abe!

From: Juan Jose Rodriguez Garcia

projects.title: Bringing the LinkedIn Experience to Hyderabad
projects.description:
The mission was to bring the LinkedIn Experience and culture to the Hyderabad Team.

The program I set up had the following goals:
- Higher productivity by arranging fun challenges each day.
- Presentations and activities that would boost their knowledge.
- Activities that would push their creativity, teamwork and thinking ‘outside of the box’.

Highlights:
-T-shirt design contest 
-Organizing the first CEX Hour in Hyderabad
- Meeting 40+ fantastic people

profile_positions.description:
Highest performer in EMEA 2015 - 112% quota attainment 

• Respond to service requests and customer inquiries and help resolve issues
• Serve as the single point of resolution for the customer.
• Assist customers with product information and site navigation. Ensure that new customers are familiar with LinkedIn procedures and processes that will impact their ability to manage their on-line businesses.
• Research and resolve inquiries in writing
• Provide feedback to management regarding necessary changes and updates; including upgrades, functionality and customer care issues.
• Responsible for attending ongoing training and developing knowledge relating to business networking, recruiting and placement.
• Accurately record customer trends using internal tools.
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Representative BeNeLux

profile_positions.description: Primary objective – Delivering an excellent customer experience for enterprise customers of LinkedIn Talent Solutions. Achieved through effectively resolving and escalating customer issues, ensuring clients are maximising the value of the solution in meeting their hiring objectives and driving utilisation of the tool. The role supports the sales organisation and proactively solves customer issues.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Services Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Interacting with LinkedIn’s members on a level that supports the full customer experience
• Providing education to LinkedIn’s 300+ million professionals in a multichannel communication environment
• Developing expertise on a variety of LinkedIn’s products and features. Assist customers with product information and site navigation
• Establishing effective working relationships across multiple departments
• Liaising with clients on technical issues using advanced trouble-shooting skills
• Effectively identifying problems and issues by performing relevant research using appropriate tools
• Ensuring potential bugs are escalated to correct departments whenever necessary
• Attending ongoing technical and nontechnical training and development related to existing and potential future roles
• Technical Support - Troubleshoot, identify, document and escalate Product Bugs and Enhancements for the LinkedIn Mobile Team.
• Interviewing new possible Customer Advocates

POC Dutch Market
POC Mobile applications EMEA & APAC

Mobile applications support

• Working on Application issues, including the LinkedIn app on mobile devices like Android, iPhone/iPad, Windows phone and Blackberry as well as Applications like CardMunch, Intro, Rapportive, Pulse and SlideShare.
• Create Help Center content for the Mobile platform
